DOC.brief_summary: To answer question whether disease specific profile breath patient lung cancer detect untargeted metabolomic study use exhale breath analysis mass spectrometry .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed lung cancer base cytological histological analysis . Group A : squamous cell carcinoma amenable surgical resection ( TNM stage IIIa ) . Group B : type lung cancer ( smallcell carcinoma , nonsmallcell carcinoma ) amenable surgical resection . Group C : healthy control . Age 18 85 year study entry Another 'active ' secondary malignant disease ( e.g . breast cancer , colon carcinoma ) group A B , presence active malignant disease group C ( base personal information ) . Acute inflammatory disease ( e.g . common cold ) within last 4 week . Any chronic lung disease chronic obstructive lung disease ( COPD ) . Acute chronic hepatic disease . Renal failure renal replacement therapy .
